text: Adolfo Tomás Ruiz Cortines (; 30 December 1889 – 3 December 1973) was a Mexican politician. He was 54th president of Mexico from 1952 to 1958. Mexican government biography Ruiz Cortines died on 3 December 1973 in Veracruz, Mexico from heart failure caused by arteriosclerosis, aged 82. ==References== Category:1889 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Presidents of Mexico Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from arteriosclerosis Category:People from Veracruz Category:20th-century presidents of Mexico
title: Adolfo Ruiz Cortines
